scripts.benchmark: npm run clean && npm run start-time && npm run clone && npm run installation && npm run serve && npm run end-time && npm run results
scripts.clean: cd src && rimraf results.json && node exec.js rimraf repoName
scripts.start-time: cd src && node introduction.js && node setTime.js "TOTAL TIME"
scripts.clone: cd src && node setTime.js "git clone" && node exec.js "git clone" repoUrl && node setTime.js "git clone"
scripts.installation: cd src && node setTime.js "npm install" && node exec.js cd repoName "&& npm i" && node setTime.js "npm install"
scripts.serve: cd src && node setTime.js "npm run dev:ssr" && node startApplication.js && node setTime.js "npm run dev:ssr"
